sqlReaderQuery.value: select BusinessEntityID,DepartmentID,StartDate from HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory where DepartmentID=@{item().DepartmentID}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSource
SalesLTCustomer derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomerSource exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomerSource lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSampleDbSource
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDestination
AzureSampleDbSource derive(CreatedHash = sha1(Name+ProductNumber)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, ProductDestination exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, ProductDestination lookup(AzureSampleDbSource@ProductID == ProductDestination@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = AzureSampleDbSource@ProductID,
		Name = AzureSampleDbSource@Name,
		ProductNumber = AzureSampleDbSource@ProductNumber,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Destination

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(between(ProductID,701,800),
	between(ProductID, 801, 900),
	between(ProductID,901,1000),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Product800, Product900, Product1000, NotMatched)
ConditionalSplit@Product800 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit@Product900 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit@Product1000 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit@NotMatched sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
